title: PGP migration
content: Trying to setup PGP EToE on multiple computers. Have tried importing keys but not all machines can decrypt. Are there videos or instructions to help with this? We have this working between two computers but adding others is proving a problem
creator: edadmin

title: Synchronizace přečtení zpráv
content: Máme v práci problém s indikací přečtení zpráv. Máme dva klienty Thunderbird, kteří mezi sebou přestali v tomto ohledu komunikovat. Když v jednom PC přečtu zprávu, u druhého klienta se to neprojeví a zpráva je stále nepřečtená. Po restartu Thunderbirdu je vše v pořádku, vypadá to že se tyto dva klienti špatně synchronizují. Thunderbird používáme již pár let, původně nám vše fungovalo, v nastavení jsme nic neměnili, ale asi před měsícem se nám začala objevovat tato chyba. Zkoušel jsem projít nastavení, spojení se serverem přes IMAP, provedl jsem diagnostiku přes Window službu Telnet a žádnou chybu jsem nenašel. Mám s tím prosím někdo zkušenost?
creator: info8771

title: Configure mail.com email in thunderbird
content: I have tried with no success. How can I configue an email from mail.com ? Best Regards
creator: ingenierostecnicostenerife

title: Email offline
content: When I use Outlook once the email has been downloaded it remains in Outlook even if I delete the email on the web server. When I use Thunderbird however, even though I have downloaded the message, when I delete from the web server it deletes the email in Thunderbird as well? How can I get around this please? Any ideas?
creator: fran.ad14

title: Delivery to the following recipients was aborted after 0 second(s):    * undeliverable.emails The reason for the problem:  550-5.7.26 This message does not pass authentication checks (SPF and DKIM both
content:
I cannot email 2 family members including my wife below so have to get my daughter to forward them....this has been for some time help please

creator: alanh2

title: Password, asking intermittent.
content:
itermittently asking for password. seems to be more often when choosing draft (subfolders) than inbox. 

i have several computers and use imap, only this computer is affected. fresh install today and i manually loctaed all folders related to mozilla/thunderbird and deleted them before installation.

This has been a problem for many months.

creator: verksted1

title: Useless and very annoying popup message needs to be removed from program code - "operation failed because another program is using the folder"
content:
I have e-mail messages in 20 or more different folders, and there are five or more accounts. When using the Offline/Download Sync command, where it checks each folder and downloads all the messages, it often generates a seemingly useless popup message. I say useless because there is literally zero that I can do to change anything that is apparently generating the problem that causes it to proclaim the error.

Apparently some other process is using a folder when the download routine attempts to use the folder, so it 'beeps' and displays the message attached below. But again, there is nothing the end user can do except be annoyed and click the OK button to close the message.

If this is needed for debug purposes or other coding programmer reasons, just put the error in a log, don't annoy the end user with a message about something over which they have zero control.
creator: tk21

title: Problem Receiving Email
content:
Hi,

I am using Thunderbird 102.8.0 (64-bit) on Windows 11 Pro (build 22621). This morning I started Thunderbird, and it will not receive email. There is no error or connection timeout. The left / right moving dot in the top left corner keeps moving. The mouse cursor is an hour glass arrow. Everything else in Thunderbird appear to work fine. I can send emails without issue. I have tried:

1. Logged into my email account via web interface to make sure it worked. 2. Used my iPad to check email, which worked. 3. Disabling firewall. 4. Creating a new email account to the same email address in Thunderbird. 5. Uninstalling / reinstalling Thunderbird. 6. Started Thunderbird in safe mode.

Nothing changed. #1 and #2 confirmed the problem does not appear to be my email server. Any ideas? Thanks.

Mike
creator: pagem

title: Cannot access my Profile and my account in Thunderbird
content: After long time use of Thunderbird, today when trying to start the application, it starts like first time asking me to setup an account. Looking in the 'profiles' folder I find my previous existent profile folder containing all the files and mails. Looking into the prefs.js file I found no line containing "mail.account.account1.server" or other "mail.account.****" data. I would much appreciate if I get help in solving this issue. Thanks
creator: vladimir.florian

title: Email reset and password
content:
Since BT changed its email system, I can't access Thunderbird - I've signed up to Mozilla and used the same password as I use to access BT, but it's not recognised by Thunderbird. I've also changed my settings from office365 to outlook.office.com, but no success there either.

Any simple solutions ?
creator: suenigel

title: How can I synchronize myThunderbird address book across devices using Thunderbird?
content:
I don't care about synchronizing with Google or other email clients, just across my devices that have Thunderbird. IE, I want all of my address book entries to automatically synch when I add/delete/modify entries across all of my devices where I have Thunderbird installed.

Thanks! Mark

content: Can't save templates using thunderbird 102.8.0 (32 bit) and windows 10
creator: jerrylusk

title: ALL Calendar Events are GONE! (102.8.0 on Windows)
content: All my calendar events disappeared! I checked the About Thunderbird, and it wasn't on the latest, so it must not have been an auto-upgrade issue. I clicked to upgrade to the latest, 102.8.0, but my calendar events are still all gone. What can I do?
creator: firefox1656

title: email junk mail
content: My 'junk' mail file keeps receiving most of my mail and the majority of it is not junk. To read all my legitimate emails I have to go to the junk mail file as well as my 'inbox' file. I can not find a way to tell Thunderbird how to not do that. I would like all my legit. mail to come to my 'inbox' and not have to search other files for it. Thank you. Larry
creator: lhoppel

title: thunderbird
content:
Microsoft mail (Outlook) was pre-installed with my laptop. My broadband server installed Thunderbird without removing Outlook. I feel the two are battling each other. Thunderbird keeps "timing out". Could I safely remove Outlook?

Thank you Jerry
creator: gwalsh4

title: error: Thunderbird is already running, but is not responding. The old Thunderbird process must be closed to open a new window.
content: It's not true! Clicking on the close thunderbird button in the error message does nothing, I've uninstalled, reinstalled rebooted. I've had this laptop 3 days, do I need to To go back to factory settings on this laptop.
creator: Dolphindave

title: INBOX-1.msf INBOX-2.msf ... INBOX-N.msf
content:
Migrated to a new laptop. Fedora 37 Thunderbird 102.8.0 (via Flatpak)

Was able to migrate Thunderbird profile without issue. However, I can not see any of my email folders or the contents of my inbox (All Folders). Under Account Settings/Server Settings/Message Storage/Local Directory is a path to my email folders. Thunderbird see this, but ignores the contents. Instead it created a new inbox, INBOX-1.msf And then every time it starts it creates a new iteration, INBOX-2.msf, etc.

Removing all *.msf files did not change a thing. Still an empty inbox and no other folders shown. And the iterations of INBOX-N.msf continue.

Any ideas on how to resolve this?
creator: bob110

title: html code appears in body of emails in INBOX
content: Please tell me how to get rid of HTML code in incoming emails to my INBOX. I am using 102.8.0 and this problem started to appear in the last two or three updates. Yes, I have way too many emails (86K), but I am trying to clean them up now with this problem. The odd thing is that sometimes they contain headers/subjects from other emails that arrived before or after them. Luckily, the emails still appear as they should be in the Google email program. Is it possible I don't have enough extra memory anymore on my old PC? I tried changing the header and message settings, but it doesn't change anything because it doesn't happen to all the emails. Would appreciate any useful advice. Thank you!
creator: karengrahn

title: Email folders cannot be synced with @163.com
content:
Hello,

I have 2 @163.com mail accounts. Both of them are successfully connected to their server and can receive and send email. But one of them, no email folders can be synced: sent, draft etc. I checked both of them are using imap.163.com to receive.

What's more, I set up the same account also in my phone. It can have all the email folders synced correctly. Thus, I suppose that it's thunderbird's issue. Is there anyone can help please?

Thanks in advance.
creator: TracyX

title: How to change font color of selected message in TB 108.8???
content: In Thunderbird 102.8 the selected message in the message list appears with white font on a gray (#DDDDDD) background, which makes the text very hard to read. Is there any way to make the text black or the background darker to improve the contrast? I've search dozens of posts on this issue but it's such a waste of time on irrelevant info since TB has changed so much recently.
creator: terry30

title: Thunderbird profile question
content: I use Gmail via Thunderbird. I am migrating away form Gmail to a private email service. They recommend I back up my Gmail prior to leaving Gmail. Does the Profile folder serve as a suitable backup? Thanks,
creator: WW13

title: e mails with attachments suddenly disappeared
content: Suddenly I appear to have stopped receiving any e mails into Inbox, that have attachments. But, if i click on the icon that says show attachments only they all show up, so i have received them but they are just not displaying normally in Inbox.
creator: sandyj20

title: Cannot send mail via office365 smtp server
content:
My organization (municipal government) switched to office 365. When I try to configure Thunderbird 102.8.0 to use office 365, I can read mail but I cannot send mail. My server settings:

IMAP: outlook.office365.com, port 993, SSL/TLS, OAuth2, account robert.handsaker@townofcharlemont.org

SMTP: smtp.office365.com, port 587, STARTTLS, OAuth2, account robert.handsaker@townofcharlemont.org

When I try to send mail, it says Login to account "robert.handsaker@townofcharlemont.org" failed. Login to server smtp.office365.com with username robert.handsaker@townofcharlemont.org failed.

If I click on Enter New Password, the dialog goes away but it doesn't offer to let me enter a different password. I've double checked the password and the password is also working fine for the IMAP server.

I read the blog posts about the problems in 102.7, but I'm on 102.8. Can you help?
creator: bhandsaker

title: Thunderbird Individual inbox foldersnot updating since update to 102.8.0 (64-bit)
content: Hi. Thunderbird Individual inbox folders updating but unified folder isn't updating since update to 102.8.0 (64-bit). Can you help?

I do not understand what and why. I have Thunderbird have for years and also Firefox so why is this happening . i wish sometimes when you have a good thing to stop messing with it . If there is a fix for this please tell me

title: All emails headings cant be seen in the inbox for one account (all others are fine)
content: It's probably something simple but I don't know how it happened and I haven't been able to fix it. Messages are loaded into the inbox and if you click on them you can read the contents but you cant see the heading to know what the content is.
creator: hazytpg

title: Calendar changes to read only
content:
I am using Thunderbird 102.7.2 on Windows 10 (recently installed). It connects to a CalDav calendar hosted on Linux/Radicale. When I dismiss or snooze an event I get the message MODIFICATION_FAILED shown in the attached image, after which my calendar is marked Read Only and I have a warning saying "the calendar Marks Calendar is temporarily unavailable."

I get a couple of errors in the Error Console:

1) Calendar: [calICSCalendar] Backup failed, no copy: TypeError: oldFile is undefined 2 CalICSCalendar.jsm:770 Calendar: There has been an error reading data for calendar: Marks Calendar. It has been placed in read-only mode, since changes to this calendar will likely result in data-loss. You may change this setting by choosing 'Edit Calendar'. Error code: 0x80004005. Description: old item mismatch in modifyItem. storedId:BEGIN:VEVENT

2) NS_ERROR_FAILURE: old item mismatch in modifyItem. storedId:BEGIN:VEVENT

On startup, if I don't dismiss or snooze an event, and the calendar NOT being in read-only mode, I can create new events w/o problem.

I do not have this problem on a Linux host with the exact same Thunderbird/Calendar settings (to the best of my knowledge).

How do I fix this?
creator: MarkFoley

title: Email server instead of client/browser
content: Will Thunderbird ever become an email server, and allow us to have a Thunderbird email address?
creator: chienetfou

title: Hover capabilities
content: Will the new update in Jul allow us to hover over a sender's name/address to see the complete address with domain, ala outlook?
creator: chienetfou

title: Add Contact to specific addressbook?
content:
I can right-click on a sender's eMail address in the eMail header and select "Add contact to addressbook". However, TBird adds it into the "Personal" addressbook which I don't use as all my contacts are synced to my Google account (and appear in a "Google Contacts" addressbook). So, when I add a contact in this manner, I have to remember to go into the Personal addressbook and drag that contact into the Google Contacts addressbook.

Is there a hidden configuration setting I can use to set this preference properly? Maybe there's an addon? I do not see any way to delete the Personal addressbook nor tell TBird to hide or ignore it.

Assistance welcomed! Thanks very much. Barry
creator: rumplestiltskin
